author.description: artist, poet, eNFanT terrible ︳ cofounder atelierart.io ︳visualpoetry.io

text:
Atelier's *Visual Poetry* exhibition will come to a close on Friday.

I'm especially excited about *Conceits*, a generative concrete poetry chapbook by the artist Onek Monk, which seeks to illustrate illusions, delusions, aspirations, hypotheticals & counterfactuals. 

I'm crazy about unicode, so this is my jam!
